  sgcool_label_text: These examples provide insight into the making of kebayas and raw material used. There are numerous pieces of bobbin lace in this donation
 the making of which was an established tradition in port cities like Malacca and Palembang by the early 20th century. European printed cotton was popular in the late 19th century and was often used to make baju panjangs
 though some pieces in this donation show that the material was used for the making of kebayas too.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a piece of fabric. It is printed with repeated patterns of a curving foliage motif.
metadata.subject_terms_1: cultural diffusion scrolls (motifs) foliage (motif) textile materials
metadata.sgcool_label_text: These examples provide insight into the making of kebayas and raw material used. There are numerous pieces of bobbin lace in this donation, the making of which was an established tradition in port cities like Malacca and Palembang by the early 20th century. European printed cotton was popular in the late 19th century and was often used to make baju panjangs, though some pieces in this donation show that the material was used for the making of kebayas too.
